source.title: Russkaja pravda
source.annotator: Rebecka Lindberg (388 sentences), Franziska Maag (29 sentences), Katie Sykes (12 sentences), Jonathan Walker (3 sentences), and Marek Majer (2 sentences)
source.reviewer: Katie Sykes (405 sentences), Hanne Eckhoff (12 sentences), and Marek Majer (2 sentences)
source.electronic-text-version: Long redaction (prostrannaja redakcija), Troickij I spisok, after the facsimile rendition in B.D. Grekov (ed.): Pravda Russkaja, vol. III: Faksimil'noe vosproizvedenie tekstov, Moscow 1963. Word division and sections follow the electronic edition at http://lib.pushkinskijdom.ru/Default.aspx?tabid=4947
source.electronic-text-publisher: TOROT / The Birds and Beasts project
